A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The main new theme\, I guess you could call it Rose's theme\, is also the theme to My Girl. Every time they played it I was pulled out of the movie. The last movie made it clear that Finn is not a pilot. Guess he took lessons while he was in a coma. Also\, the entire Finn plot and the entire Leia gets injured plot are wastes of time. It felt like they just needed something for these characters to do. That's all I'll say because most of my other thoughts have already been echoed.
